episodes.title: #206 - Steve-O & ME
episodes.summary: Comedian & Jackass star Steve-O and I hang out in the Mancave and talk about stand-up, getting cast in Jackass, his infamous Goldfish stunt, his "Don't Try this at Home" DVD series, his financial compensation with respect to the seasons & movies, and of course Sex and Drugs and Drugs and Sex.

episodes.title: #202 - Danish & O'Neil & ME
episodes.summary: Jeff Danis & Ryan O’Neill are writers, performers, and podcaster – we hang out in the Mancave drink White Wine, High Altitude Beers, more White Wine, Whiskey and talk about the East Coast/West Coast Comedy WAR, Freddy Soto, the conundrum that is Hasidic Ari Shaffir, wet dreams on horses, and my poetry period!

episodes.title: #201 - Zane Lamprey & ME
episodes.summary:
My buddy Zane Lamprey & I hang out in the Mancave and talk about his TV shows, his Kickstarter campaigns, including Chug, the Drinking Hoodie, & his newest venture the Adventure Hoodie, which have all set record numbers at Kickstarter...and what he is doing next.

Zane Lamprey’s Adventure Hoodie: ADV3NTURE.com/HOODI3S

episodes.title: #200 - Bill Burr, Tom Segura, & ME
episodes.summary:
MY 200th EPISODE!!!

Comedians Bill Burr & Tom Segura hang out in the Mancave for a cigar and some Bourbon - we talk sports, fat shaming, hunting, and regretful Wu-Tang Trains.

This podcast is brought to you by:

My Showtime Special "The Machine" Airing November 11th at 10pm

ME: http://www.bertbertbert.com

Zane Lamprey's Adventure Hoodie: ADV3NTURE.com/HOODI3S

episodes.title: #199 - Moonshine, Trae Crowder, Corey Forrester, Drew Morgan, & ME
episodes.summary: Comedians Trae Crowder, Corey Forrester, & Drew Morgan hang with me in the Mancave, drink Moonshine, & talk about Trae's viral videos The Liberal Redneck, their new Book The Liberal Redneck Manifesto, the south, racism, & Speedos!!!

episodes.title: #198 - Shane Mauss & ME
episodes.summary: Comedian Shane Mauss & I hang out in the Mancave to talk about Herbal Pharmaceuticals, racism & bigotry within Liberals politics, Topple the Patriarchy, vaping, his heals, & his new tour!

episodes.title: #197 - Eleanor Kerrigan & ME (phoner w/  Sean Evans from HOT ONES)
episodes.summary:
Stand-up Comedian Eleanor Kerrigan & I hang out in the Mancave & talk about her time as a waitress at The Comedy Store, Freddy Soto, Joe Rogan, Carlos Mencia, growing up in Philly, working with Mitzi Shore, & getting into Stand-up.

Also Sean Evans the host of one of my favorite shows, Hot Ones on First We Feast, calls in to talk about the theft of his show's concept by Fox Sports Australia's, The 'Other" Rugby Show.

You can watch ME on Hot Ones Here:

https://youtu.be/1B9cdcjI2_U?list=PLAzrgbu8gEMIIK3r4Se1dOZWSZzUSadfZ 

& you can see the Fox Sports Australia show HERE:

https://youtu.be/EsB719OyoEc

You be the judge!

episodes.title: #196 - George Perez & ME
episodes.summary: Comedian George Perez hangs out in the Mancave w/ me - we drink some beers and talk about his lateral move from chollo to stand-up comic, his quick rise to TV, a fist fight that resulted in him losing it all and going to prison, getting out, and getting back into stand-up...you are going to love this podcast!!!

episodes.title: #195 - Ralph Garman & ME
episodes.summary: Actor, Comedian, Podcaster, & Radio Host Ralph Garman hangs out in the Mancave to talk about his unique path through Hollywood, Nerd Culture, Comic Con before it was hip, his Podcast with Kevin Smith, & what TV series we would like to bring back and star in!

episodes.title: #194 - Greg Fitzsimmons & ME
episodes.summary: Comedian Greg Fitzsimmons and I hang out in the Mancave and talk about the theory of dumping all your material and starting fresh each year, my shitty parenting, raising kids & being comics, and getting old with our wives.

episodes.title: #193 - Christina Pazsitzky & ME
episodes.summary: Stand up Comedian, Podcaster, "MTV-Road Rules" Alumni Christina Pazsitzky stop by the Mancave to have a VERY real conversation about depression, my drinking, the fat shaming campaign going on between me & her very FAT husband Tom Segura...then my wife joins in to mention what a horrible husband I am.

episodes.title: #192 - Bret Ernst & ME
episodes.summary: Comedian Bret Ernst and I talk about working for TBS on a Frat show pilot, partying on the road w/ the Young American Comedy Tour, and bullshit about Dov Davidoff.

episodes.title: #191 - Robert Kelly & ME
episodes.summary: Comedian Robert Kelly & I hang out at the V Cut Smoke Shop & Lounge on Melrose in Los Angeles, have a couple of Tatuaje Cigars & talk about Patrice O'Neal, our problems w/ eating, Tough Crowd w/ Colin Quinn, Opie and Anthony, & the pitfalls of having expectations in show business.

episodes.title: #190 - Ms. Pat & ME
episodes.summary:
Comedian Ms. Pat and I hang out in the Mancave & talk about The Montreal Just For Laughs Festival, Roast Battle w/ Jeff Ross, & BLACK POEPLE...Black people vs. cops, Black people vs. White people, Black people vs. Black People, Black people at Jack in the Box, you name it - we cover it!!!

It gets DEEP!!!

episodes.title: #189 - Kelly Maclean & ME
episodes.summary: It's a swapcast in the MANCAVE w/ Kelly MacLean & the Tao Of Comedy - rate, subscribe, & & review her podcast! She interviews me - so enjoy!

episodes.title: #188 - The Ballad, Ari Shaffir, Ryan O'Neill, Kathleen McGee, Mat Edgar, & ME
#184 - Kimberly Congdon, Sara Weinshenk, & ME
episodes.summary: It's a Boozer!!! Comedians Kimberly Congdon Sara Weinshenk drink with me in the mancave and talk about Florida, Gators, Hurricanes, Debbie, Steve and Gus!

episodes.title: #183 - Frank Mir, Richard Hunter, & ME
episodes.summary:
It's a Sunday Swapcast Special!!!

2 time UFC Heavyweight Champion Frank Mir & his podcasting partner, Comic & Radio veteran Richard Hunter bring their podcast, PHONEBOOTH FIGHTING, into the Mancave and join me for a laugh filled Swapcast.  We talk about fighting, comedy, & Micheal Vicks dogs. 

Check out their podcast at www.phoneboothfighting.com

episodes.title: #182 - Owen Benjamin & ME
episodes.summary: Comedian Owen Benjamin and I hang in the Mancave - we break down two jokes we are working on, talk about the Orlando Shooting, Political Correctness, then Tom Segura calls in and Owen tell us about the time he had to walk out of Joey Diaz's Podcast due to an over prescription of THC...lastly I share with him my obsession with Google Trends.

episodes.title: #181 - Ron White & ME
episodes.summary: Comedian Ron White and I hang out in his home to talk comedy, drugs, Texas, and drink his Tequila, Number Juan Tequila.

episodes.title: #180 - Harley Morenstein & ME
episodes.summary: Comedic Actor, Star & Creator of the show EPIC MEAL TIME, Harley Morenstein, sits in the Mancave with me and talks about Epic Meal Time, it's origins, VLOGs, his VLOG, Montreal, and BLOWS MY MIND (along with my wife) with Game of Thrones theory!

episodes.title: # 179 - DOUG LOVES BERT
episodes.summary:
Comedian Doug Benson and I hang out in my hotel room in St. Louis and talk about one of the weirdest episodes Doug Loves Movies I've ever been apart of.

SPOILER ALERT–we're still friends!

episodes.title: #178 - Nick Youssef & ME
episodes.summary: Comedian Nick Youssef and I hang out in the Mancave and talk about his new comedy album "1982", his start in comedy at the Store answering phones, the opportunities provided to different generations of comedians, and we explore this history of what we google on our phones.

episodes.title: #177 - Danish & O'Neill & ME
episodes.summary: Jeff Danis & Ryan O'Neill are writers, performers, and podcaster - we hang out in the Mancave and kill 36 BEERS talking about their time working for the grocery delivery service Yummy, celebrities they delivered groceries to, working at the comedy store, and that time O'Neill tried to get his girlfriends dog to suck his dick.

episodes.title: #176 - Annie Lederman& ME
episodes.summary: Comedian Annie Lederman and I hang out in the Mancave and talk about growing up in Philly, her degenerate youth, drinking hard as fuck in Santa Fe, getting into comedy, getting sober, & the brilliance of Kurt Metzger.

episodes.title: #175 - Kira Soltanovich & ME
episodes.summary: Comedian Kira Soltanovich hangs out with me (& at 2 hours in my wife LeeAnn) in the Mancave to talk about her new comedy special "YOU DID THIS TO ME" which she shot 7 months pregnant, peeing her pants during it, the state of the entertainment industry, social media, spanking our children, and like I said, at 2 hours in my wife shows up and they share horror stories about their mothers.

episodes.title: #174 - Best of Bertcast (ReReleased)
episodes.summary: If you like me lauging your’ll love this compilation of the #BestofBertcast Volume 1 with Bill Burr, Mike Calta (aka Cowhead), Matt Mira, Shane Mauss, Big Jay Oakerson, Ben Bailey, Ali Spagnola, Keith Meyers, Chris Tye Walker’s  Workout, & #ThePirateSong.

episodes.title: #173 - Mike Busey & ME
episodes.summary: Mike Busey and I hang out at the Sausage Castle and talk about how he got where he is today, the future of the Sausage Castle, partying w/ the Jackass Crew, working with Vice & Eddie Huang, & the true sense of community that is the Sausage Castle.

episodes.title: #172 - Margaret Cho & ME
episodes.summary: Comedian Margaret Cho & I sit in her house & talk about rape jokes, aggressive audience members, dominatrixes, porn, and comedy.

episodes.title: #171 - Jeff Dye & ME
episodes.summary: Comedian Jeff Dye & I hang out in the Mancave & talk about past managers, my theory on the "comics' spirit", our constitutions, hi-jinx, The Vanderjagt Jersey, his tour w/ Brandt Tobler, Alt Comics vs. Bro Comics, & working on television.

episodes.title: #170 - Steve Agee & ME
episodes.summary: Comedian Steve Agee joins me in the Mancave and we talk about his stand-up, Sarah Silverman, Janeane Garofalo, his cross country train trip, Catcalling, and both of our bouts w/ anxiety.

episodes.title: #169 - Shane Mauss & ME
episodes.summary: Comedian Shane Mauss & I hang out in the Mancave and talk about getting complaints at Comedy Clubs, his LA Ayahuasca experience, DMT, his broken heels, and doing cocaine with the Mexican cartel in Texas.

episodes.title: #169 - Shane Mauss & ME
episodes.summary: Comedian Shane Mauss & I hang out in the Mancave and talk about getting complaints at Comedy Clubs, his LA Ayahuasca experience, DMT, his broken heels, and doing cocaine with the Mexican cartel in Texas.

episodes.title: #168 - Jerry Rocha & ME
episodes.summary: Comedian Jerry Rocha and I hang out in the Mancave & talk about working the Laff Stop in Houston, his start in comedy, the guys he saw stall due to drugs and alcohol, growing up in an apartment, and moving to LA.

episodes.title: #167 - Esther Ku & ME
episodes.summary: Comedian Esther Ku hangs out in the Mancave w/ me & my wife to talk about Miami, comedy, growing up in a hostile household, & Asian Men!

episodes.title: #166 - Doug Stanhope, Greg Chaille, Chad Shank, & ME
episodes.summary: Comedian Doug Stanhope, Greg Chaille, & Chad Shank (All Part of The Doug Stanhope Shotclog Podcast) & I hang out in Bisbee for one very drunken, gut laughing SWAPCAST...to be dead honest I don;t remember much of the evening so your guess is as good as mine...all I remember is that I laughed my ass off and it was a complete and total blast - Make sure to check out the last two episodes of Doug's Podcast b/c the plot thickens and shit gets interesting.

episodes.title: #164 - Danny Bonaduce & ME
episodes.summary: Radio/television personality, comedian, professional wrestler, and former child actor Danny Bonaduce & I hang out and talk about sobriety, Breaking Bonaduce, Radio, Wrestling, Johnny FairPlay, & John Heffron.

episodes.title: #163 - Colt Cabana & ME
episodes.summary: Podcaster & Professional Wrestler Colt Cabana & I hang out in the Mancave and talk about CM Punk, podcasting, personas, wrestling, & doing the road.

episodes.title: #162 - Pete Holmes & ME
episodes.summary: Comedian, actor, & podcaster Pete Holmes hangs out in the Mancave with me to talk about his late night TBS talk show, his Podcast YOU MADE IT WEIRD, getting passed at the Cellar, his new HBO show "Crashing", and what its like working with Judd Apatow.

episodes.title: #161 - Luis J. Gomez & ME
episodes.summary: Comedian Luis J. Gomez hangs out with me and we talk about political correctness in comedy & bloggers, his podcast Legion of Skanks, and he brings my gardener into the Mancave for an interview about El Chapo.

episodes.title: #160 - Adam Carolla & ME
episodes.summary:
Adam Carolla & I hang out and talk about The Man Show, Jimmy Kimmel, Loveline, getting fired from radio, and how he manages & balances his creativity & work.

Check out www.berries.com and www.bertcast.com

episodes.title: #159 - Kate Quigley & ME
episodes.summary: Comedian Kate Quigley & I hang out in the Mancave & talk about her 1st marriage & divorce, getting into comedy, our love of Periscope, our control issues, & sexual assault.

episodes.title: #158 -  JessiMae Peluso & ME
episodes.summary: Comedian Jessimae Peluso hangs out with me in the Mancave & we talk about riding horses topless in Central America, getting fired from TV shows, and date rape.

episodes.title: #157 - Christopher Titus & ME
episodes.summary:
Stand-up Comedian Christopher Titus stops by the Mancave to talk about how to write a great story for the stage, his first one hour special "Norman Rockwell is Bleeding", his Fox sitcom "Titus", how NOT to talk to network presidents, creating & owning your own content...and so much more!

THIS IS A GREAT FUCKING EPISODE!!!

episodes.title: #156 - **REMASTERED** #152 - Joey Diaz & ME
episodes.summary: I fixed the audio levels!!! its Joey Diaz and Me again but this time you can hear us!!!

episodes.title: #155 - BLACK SAILS Special w/ Co-Creator Jonathan Steinberg & ME
episodes.summary:
Show Runner & Co-Creator, of the STARZ original series BLACK SAILS, Jonathan Steinberg, welcomes me into his office to talk about my favorite show on Television, BLACK SAILS. We talk about how created it, pitched it, sold it, how they write it, Season 3, & go back and forth through each lead actor, discussing what we think are their most pivotal scenes. 

BLACK SAILS Season 3 Premieres January 23rd on STARZ & airs Every Saturday night thereafter.

episodes.title: #154 - Sam Roberts & ME
episodes.summary: From Sirius/XM's The Opie & Anthony Show, & The Sam Roberts Show, radio host Sam Robert sits down with me in my manacle and interviews me.

episodes.title: #153 - Sam Tripoli & ME
episodes.summary: Hanging out in the Mancave, Comedian Sam Tripoli and I talk about our paths in comedy, how he likes to have sex, how he likes to party, starting out at the Comedy Store, & his new tour

episodes.title: #152 - Joey "Coco" Diaz & ME
episodes.summary: Comedian Joey Diaz drops by the Mancave!

episodes.title: #151 - Tommy Johnagin & ME
episodes.summary: Comedian Tommy Johnagin & I hang outside the Mancave, have a couple of cigars & talk about meeting on the road 11 years ago, his approach to writing, not having sex with our wives, & the absolutely brilliance of Ron Bennington.

episodes.title: #150 - Jimmy Tingle & ME
episodes.summary: Boston Comedy Legend Jimmy Tingle joins me in the Mancave: We talk bout doing Star Search, doing Johnny Carson, One Man Shows, and comedy in Boston in the 80's.

episodes.title: #149 - Doug Benson & ME
episodes.summary: Comedian Doug Benson & I hang in the Mancave and talk about him working at the WB, black comics, & being friends w/ Celebrity Comedians.

episodes.title: #148 - AdventureCast: Starbucks
episodes.summary: Back by popular demand it's my Sunday Morning AdventureCast. I talk about Jury Duty, getting on Propecia, losing my dick, banging young pornstar/DJ's, & I go to Starbucks.

episodes.title: #147 - Matt Fulchiron & ME
episodes.summary: Matt Fulchiron & I drive from Hollywood to the Irvine Improv and dissect the problems with American dietary issues, weight loss, traffic in LA, and why so many fly ass honeys are on his D!!!

episodes.title: #146 – Book Club Crash – So You’ve Been Publicly Shamed, by Jon Ronson
episodes.summary: As luck would have it, I had just finished LeeAnn’s Book Club Book on a plane – So you’ve Been Publicly Shamed , by Jon Ronson  - so I decided to invite her & her 5 friends into the Mancave to have their book club w/ me. We talk about the book, Public Shaming, Social Justice Warriors, Twitter, Facebook, Gossip at our kids’ School, & much much more!   I hope you enjoy it!

episodes.title: #145 -Bert Kreischer & ME
episodes.summary: It's early, I'm up, so why not podcast. I talk about my weight lost, lifestyle change, podcasting w/ Rogan & Joey, & I go get donuts!

episodes.title: #144.5 - The rest of the - Geoff Tate, Emma Arnold, Jay Snyder, Jason Cantor, & ME
episodes.summary: Sorry...

episodes.title: #144 - Geoff Tate, Emma Arnold, Jay Snyder, Jason Cantor, & ME
episodes.summary: 4 very talented comics & I hanging out in my hotel room in Dayton and I shoot the shit about everything, but mostly I talk.

episodes.title: #143 - Chris Porter & ME
episodes.summary: Comedian Chris Porter and I hang out in the Mancave and talk about hanging w/ Kid Rock, Last Comic Standing, dick comics, how great Nick Dipaolo is, and I explain how I owe my success to him and Earthquake!

episodes.title: #142 - LeeAnn Kreischer & ME
episodes.summary: My wife LeeAnn and I talk about being single, Scuba diving, the eccentricities of comedians like Me, Joey Diaz, and Ari Shaffir, and the stresses of her insomnia mixed with my touring.

episodes.title: #141 - Joe Bartnick & ME
episodes.summary:
Comedian and NHL Junkie Joe Bartnick and I sit in the Mancave & talk about Comedy, touring with the Queen Of Mean Lisa Lampanelli, going long on stage, and podcasting.

BUY his book - You Might be a Douche Bag

episodes.title: #140 - Theo Von & ME
episodes.summary: Comedian Theo Von & I hang out in the Mancave & talk about our experience on Reality Bites Back, growing up poor in Louisiana w/ a 70 yearold father, getting emancipated at 14, getting attacked by cats, riding black kids to school on his bike, his time on Road Rules on MTV, and how his stand-up got so fucking good!

episodes.title: #139.5 - The end of the UNDERGRADUATE
episodes.summary: Sorry it cut off - Here is the end of the article, not sure why it stopped

episodes.title: #139 - The Rolling Stone Magazine article "The Undergraduate"
episodes.summary: I read the Rolling Stone article written about about me in 1997 titled The Undergraduate in which I was titled The #1 Party Animal in the Country...this is the article that changed my life. I am a bad out loud reader so beware of spirals!

episodes.title: #138 - Yakov Smirnoff & ME
episodes.summary: Comedian Yakov Smirnoff & I hang out at his office in Branson, Missouri w/ my crew & talk about the Soviet Union, doing comedy in the Soviet Union, his move to the US, the Comedy Store and his move to LA, the fall of Communism, his career, and  of course I mention the Machine Story.

episodes.title: #137 - Sean Conroy & ME
episodes.summary: Comedian, Actor, & Podcaster Sean Conroy and I hang out in the Mancave and talk about looking like big aggressive men, Micro-agressions, stand-up, Improv, the UCB, and him beating me out for the co-hosting job of Nevermind the Buzzcocks.

episodes.title: #136 - Tait Fletcher & ME
episodes.summary: Actor, Mixed Martial Artist, Podcaster, Stunt Man, and Co-Founder of CAVE MAN COFFEE - Tait Flecther and I hang out and the Mancave and for the first time ever, I listen, and he is one amazing person....He is that fucking interesting!!! #Life #PirateLife #Direction #AMAZINGPODCAST #Duece #CaveManCoffee

episodes.title: #135 - Jon Huck, Bryan Erwin, & ME
episodes.summary: Hosts of the podcast Hollywood Anonymous Jon Huck & Bryan Erwin sit down the mancave with me & talk about fights, comedy, podcasts, and mostly about me

episodes.title: #134 - Owen Benjamin & ME
episodes.summary: Comedian Owen Benjamin and I hang out in the mancave, drink beers, talk trash, and get bombarded by children at the end.

episodes.title: #133 - Jackie Kashian & ME
episodes.summary: Stand-Up Comedian & OG Podcaster Jackie Kashian & I hang out in the Mancave and talk about losing her mother, #YesAllWomen, LARP-ing, and Alternative Comedy.

episodes.title: #132 - Ari Shaffir, Duncan Trussell, & ME
episodes.summary: Live from the Just For Laughs Comedy Festival in Montreal comedians Ari Shaffir & Duncan Trussell sit down with me infront of a live audience and talk about being generous lovers, death, and drugs.

episodes.title: #131 - (UTAH TRIP FLIP Special) Creighton Baird & Me
episodes.summary: Adventurer, rock climber, internet star, & all around adrenaline enthusiast Creighton Baird hangs out w/ me and my Trip Flip crew on a houseboat to talk about pushing his girlfriend off a cliff, growing up Mormon, and creating The Corona Arch Swing a.k.a "Worlds Most Insane Epic Rope Swing" for Devon Supertramp.

episodes.title: #130 - Al Jackson, Omar Dorsey, Terry Jingles, & ME
episodes.summary: Its a a BLACKCAST & we get "Turnt up".  Early, drinking, and talking shit...Comedian Al Jackson, Actor Omar Dorsey, and Producer Terry Jingles and I get hammered at 9 am & talk about .

episodes.title: #129 - Mike Tully & ME
episodes.summary: Co-Host of the Jason Ellis SHow, Author, & Musician Mike Tully hangs with me in the Mancave to talk about his path from Jersey, to Oxford, weaving through the music industry, writing movies and books with Jason Ellis, and YES we have an ANALOGY OFF...OH and I almost forgot, I play some of his original music!!!

episodes.title: #128 - Neal Brennan & ME
episodes.summary: Comedian & Co-Creator of the Chapelle Show, Neal Brennan and I hang out in the mancave & talk about Hip Hop, writing Half Baked, working with Chappelle, his big family, his comedy career, & directing comercials.

episodes.title: #127 - Jim Jefferies & ME
episodes.summary: Comedian Jim Jefferies & I hang out in the Mancave & talk about British Stand-up vs. American Stand-up vs. Austrailian Stand-up, touring, working on Legit, & one of his most epic drug fueled radio apperances on Opie & Anthony.

episodes.title: #126 - Doug Benson & ME
episodes.summary:
Comedian Doug Benson & I hang out in the Mancave and talk about Rollercoasters, his first time bungee jumping, Louis CK, alternative touring, & greening out on dabs.

episodes.title: #125 - Todd Glass & ME
episodes.summary: Comedian Todd Glass comes over to the Mancave & we talk about warm towels, how to throw great parties, & how to run amn A list comedy club with little to no effort, and the pure joys of a candle, a group of friends, great lighting, & little pot.
